PluginCommandHelpMessage:
Shows the config for the visibility plugin.
Additional help available via '/pvis help'
VoidPlayerHelpMessage:
Adds player to void list.
Usage: /void <firstname> <lastname> <worldname> <reason>
VoidTargetPlayerHelpMessage:
Adds targeted player to void list.
Usage: /voidtarget <reason>
WhitelistTargetPlayerHelpMessage:
Adds targeted player to whitelist.
Usage: /whitelisttarget
PluginCommandHelpMenu3: /pvis <setting> <on/off/toggle> - Sets a setting to on, off or toggles it
InvalidWorldNameError: {0}: '{1}' is not a valid world name.
OptionEarthlyStarTip: Hides Earthly Star not belonging to players in your party (Only works in combat)
OptionContextMenuTip: Enables context menu (Right-Click menu) on a player name in chat
OptionShowTargetOfTargetTip: Disables hiding the target of your current target if it is hidden by your settings (Does not affect voided targets)
